message: Let's start fair.  You get 10% and I take 90%.  I'm sure we can find a better deal for you in the future.
You were too generous last round. I'll take more this time.
I'm not sure why you rejected my first offer.  This is a much better deal for you, but I'm not willing to go any lower.  Accept this and we can both move on.
I'm not impressed with your counteroffer. I'll take more this time.
This is the last offer I'm willing to make.  We're both losing money with each round, so let's settle this now.
I'm not going to get taken advantage of. I'll take 80% and be done with it.
